overview:
Seth is a strategist and entrepreneur who helps build new products, teams, and organizations, leveraging substantial experience in the public, private, and non-profit sectors.

After graduating from Harvard Business School and Columbia Law, Seth has worked at Bain & Co, Morgan Stanley, the U.S. Treasury Department, and the Federal Reserve. He has also launched or invested in a number of technology or non-profit startups. Seth’s particular passion is leading teams in solving complex policy and strategy problems as they build new programs or products.
